thread.title: Celebrity sale: Jerry Garcia's former home is on the market
thread.title_full: Celebrity sale: Jerry Garcia's former home is on the market

title: Celebrity sale: Jerry Garcia's former home is on the market
text:
* 48 hours in San Francisco SOCALMLS 
The oceanview property is located north of San Francisco in Stinson Beach, California. It was recently listed for $6 million. ﻿ 
The couple saw San Souci as the perfect respite from Garcia's busy touring and recording schedule. They raised their three daughters there and kept a number of pets, including a horse and a domesticated crow. 
Marin County is one of the richest (per capita income) areas in the United States. Other notable residents include George Lucas, Sean Penn and the late Robin Williams. Ad Feedback SOCALMLS 
Although it’s been renovated and updated since the legendary Grateful Dead frontman lived there, his spirit, and a few relics, remain. SOCALMLS 
The home has everything a luxury home buyer desires, including open living spaces with vaulted ceilings and walls made of reclaimed wood. SOCALMLS 
Garcia and his wife paid US$20,000 for the property in 1971, the equivalent of about NZ$164,000 today. SOCALMLS 
The open kitchen has been updated with Viking and Miele appliances. SOCALMLS 
The main house has three bedrooms, including this master suite. SOCALMLS 
The master bedroom opens out to a sun-drenched deck. SOCALMLS 
Perhaps this tile is an echo of the tie-dyed t-shirts favoured by "Deadheads"? SOCALMLS 
Across the courtyard is a guest apartment, shown here, and a separate guest cottage. SOCALMLS 
The guest cottage is the highest point of the property and features a clever sleeping loft that was once Garcia’s studio. SOCALMLS 
Many of the Grateful Dead's best-known songs were composed in this loft. SOCALMLS 
Garcia entertained and jammed with other musical luminaries at Sans Souci, including Bob Dylan and John Lennon. SOCALMLS 
Sans Souci was a bit more rustic and bucolic in the ’70s, according to listing agent Jon DiRienzo of Paragon Real Estate Group Marin. SOCALMLS 
Outside there’s a black-bottom pool and spa. SOCALMLS 
Along with this fireplace, there's a fully-equipped outdoor kitchen kitchen with a built-in grill and stove. SOCALMLS 
Located in Marin County, the home offers views from Bolinas peninsula in the north to San Francisco in the south. - Stuff
